channel.title: gutenbergtimes tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from gutenbergtimes.

item.description: What to Expect From WordPress 6.0 by Birgit Pauli-Haack @bph https://t.co/9aIcy4lJHX via @getpantheon

WordPress 6.0 is now available. Watch this fun video to learn what's new. https://t.co/Zwb4LAsttO
Announcement on WordPress News: https://t.co/lNGlRRsxm8
WordPress 6.0 Field Guide with all DevNotes for developers building products and site. https://t.co/QlMxTxaiPT
Video: Exploring WordPress 6.0: Style Variations, Block Locking UI, Writing Improvements, & more w/ Anne McCarthy https://t.co/mc9zsMzSzv
If you want to know how far the block-editor has come after 10 releases? Building a site with WordPress 5.0 vs WordPress 6.0 https://t.co/OybhyEuX9e

WordCamp Europe, 75 Themes, Thunks and Filters - Weekend Edition 216 // curated news by Birgit Paul-Haack @bph with contributions by @priethor @nickmdiego @wpbuilds @ana_segota @ryelle @carolinapoena @justintadlock @kevinbardorf @ryanwelcher @adamzielin https://t.co/Fg0BLSBuYc
Creating Style Variations for your block theme https://t.co/3wZTTYcmoM

Three Block Theme Generators, Coupons with Blocks + more - WE 215 by @bph w/ contributions by @pootlepress @revgeorge @wpbuilds @dgwyer @carolinapoena @RuthRaventos @courtneyr_dev @succoallapera @vikasprogrammer @2ndKauboy @m_munirkamal @get_da https://t.co/YwtNc8YJbh
@Lana_Miro Thank you for your kind words and recommendation ü§óüéâ -- birgit
@pootlepress Ah sorry. Fett fingered it on the auto-correct. - Birgit
